message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $18000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While $15000 is a good starting point, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my initial price of $18000. Would you be willing to consider $16500? It's a fair compromise that allows both of us to get a good deal.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $15000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
